turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Hi, I need a refill for my medication. Can you tell me the process and how long it usually takes?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Are you asking about how long it takes to get an appointment or about a specific procedure or service at Pivot Point Orthopedic? Let me know what you're interested in and I'll explain the process in timing.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: I'm asking about the medication refill process, please. How long does that usually take?

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Thank you! I just want to make sure I understand what I need to do to get my refill.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Do I need to contact my pharmacy, or do you handle the refill request directly?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: You can request your refill directly through us.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Great! How long does it usually take to process the refill once I request it?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Once you request a refill, it usually takes 1 to 2, business days for the clinic to process and send it to your Pharmacy.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Okay, that sounds good. Do I need to provide any specific information when I request the refill?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Yes, when you request a refill, it helps to provide your full name date of birth, the medication name and your preferred Pharmacy. This makes the process faster and smoother.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: My date of birth is March 15, 1985.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Let me confirm your name is Alex Johnson and your date of birth is March 15th.

turns.speaker: patient
turns.text: Thanks, that’s all I needed. Bye.

scenario_text: You need a medication refill. You ran out and want to know the process and expected timeline.
